question:
[John] enjoys going fishing with his brother. His name is [Scott]. [John] and his Aunt [Valerie] flew first class [John] took his son [Brian] out to play gold later that night. [Harry] helped his daughter [Kerrie] into her booster seat and sat behind the wheel of the car. His sister [Valerie] rode in passenger seat beside him. [Melissa] and her son [Bruce] made hot dogs. [Bruce]'s brother [Scott] ate one. [Kerrie] and her brother [Victor] went to see a movie. [Victor]'s aunt [Melissa] took him to the store to do some last minute party shopping. [Joy] and her brother [Brian] went to see a movie.
Question: How is [John] related to [Joy]?
